resource.chars:
1862.
Flower 
by
Huxley
The Gov. School of Mines 
Jermyn S March 4th 1862
Before making my Report upon 
Mr Flowers paper “On the posterior 
lobes of the cerebrum in the Quadrumana”
it is right that I should state 
that the questions therein 
discussed have been the subjects 
of controversy: that I have taken 
an active part in that 
controversy: & that Mr Flowers
Memoir contains a complete 
confirmation of the statements 
I have made
